Constructor Detail

TabSwitcher

public TabSwitcher(javax.swing.JTabbedPane jtp,
                   int tabIndex,
                   SubGUI gui,
                   int compIndex)
Sets up a new TabSwitcher. When an action event is received this TabSwitcher will swap the Component of the tab at index 'tabIndex' of the JTabbedPane 'jtp' to the Component in 'gui' with the index 'compIndex'.

Method Detail

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
This method performs the actual Component swapping.
